title.en: Hydrate Move - Free Office Wellness Timer
title.zh-CN: Hydrate Move - 免费办公健康提醒器

description.en: Free browser-based office wellness timer that reminds you to drink water and stand up every 30 minutes. Works in any modern browser.
description.zh-CN: 免费的浏览器办公健康提醒工具，每30分钟提醒喝水和站立。支持所有现代浏览器。

keywords.en: office wellness, water reminder, standup reminder, health timer, productivity, work habits, hydration tracker, posture break
keywords.zh-CN: 办公健康, 喝水提醒, 站立提醒, 健康计时器, 生产力, 工作习惯, 饮水追踪, 姿势休息

appSubtitle.en: Office Wellness Reminder - Maintain Healthy Work Habits
appSubtitle.zh-CN: 办公健康提醒 - 保持健康工作习惯

description.en: Stay hydrated and take movement breaks every 30 minutes. Free privacy-first office wellness timer that works offline with no registration required.
description.zh-CN: 每30分钟保持水分和运动休息。免费的隐私优先办公健康计时器，可离线工作，无需注册。

en: Water reminder every 30 minutes for better hydration
Standup reminder for posture breaks and movement
Browser-based application with no installation required
Privacy-first design with local storage only
Free office productivity tool for remote workers
zh-CN: 每30分钟喝水提醒，更好保持水分
站立提醒，改善姿势和运动
基于浏览器的应用，无需安装
隐私优先设计，仅本地存储
免费的远程工作生产力工具
